prompts: Create a sandy Pokemon that resembles a fortress with a spooky vibe.
I want a ghost-type Pokemon that looks like it's made of sand and has colorful towers.
Generate an eerie Pokemon with sandy textures and a haunting presence in the desert.
Make a playful, sandy creature that can blend into its desert surroundings effortlessly.
Imagine a Pokemon that appears like a sandcastle with a mysterious aura and hidden powers.
Design a quirky ghost Pokemon with small flags and a sandy body structure.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a sandstorm with a whimsical twist.
